body_html: @colesbury thanks for this work and especially the accumulate option. Are there any plans to add an axis argument to put_ as well? Specifying the index for each individual element of a tensor can take quite a lot of place in memory.
body_text: @colesbury thanks for this work and especially the accumulate option. Are there any plans to add an axis argument to put_ as well? Specifying the index for each individual element of a tensor can take quite a lot of place in memory.
body: @colesbury thanks for this work and especially the accumulate option. Are there any plans to add an axis argument to put_ as well? Specifying the index for each individual element of a tensor can take quite a lot of place in memory.
